column16: (1).Frequency of disability (excluding after the third decimal point)=Times of disability / Total person-work hours *1,000,000.
(2).Severity of disability (excluding after the decimal point)=Total workday lost / Total person-work hours *1,000,000.
(3).Data series in the table exclude the traffic accidents on the commute.
